mil.nga.giat.mage.sdk.datastore.location

Class LocationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.mage.sdk.datastore.DaoHelper<Location>
      • mil.nga.giat.mage.sdk.datastore.location.LocationHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDaoHelper<Location>, IEventDispatcher<ILocationEventListener>

    public class LocationHelper
extends DaoHelper<Location>
implements IEventDispatcher<ILocationEventListener>
    A utility class for accessing Location data from the physical data model. The details of ORM DAOs and Lazy Loading should not be exposed past this class.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class mil.nga.giat.mage.sdk.datastore.DaoHelper

      • deleteUserLocations

        public int deleteUserLocations(java.lang.String userLocalId,
                               java.lang.Boolean keepMostRecent,
                               Event event)
                        throws LocationException
        This will delete the user's location(s) that have remote_ids. Locations that do NOT have remote_ids have not been sync'ed w/ the server.
        Parameters:
        userLocalId - The user's local id
        Throws:
        LocationException
